name: TempTribe
description: With our bespoke app for both clients and staff, as well as our internal team software, we are currently a market leader in the temporary staffing industry and are looking for the next addition to our team to take us to the next level - world domination to quickly follow.

jobs.title: Account Manager
jobs.description:
Led by our fearless Managing Director Jo and expert Account Director Clara, we are now looking for an Account Manager to join our team. You'll be liaising with London's newest and well renowned 5* hotels, caterers, stadiums, restaurants and more! Your role will involve managing existing relationships with your own portfolio of clients given to you, as well as targeted incentives to bring in more! This is the perfect role for an outgoing & driven person who wants responsibility and autonomy in their work. 

Mainly office based with weekly on site visits to clients, sign ins for staff and some on call days. With occasional weekend commitments, you will have the autonomy to create your own work schedule. The role is demanding but diverse, giving you the opportunity to use your charisma and skills in business development, all whilst representing the TempTribe brand. 

Tasks Will Include: 

- Making your clients your best friends!
- Using our bespoke software to manage client rotas
- Expanding your current portfolio 
- Regular visit your clients at London’s top luxury venues
- Entertaining clients
- Matching suitable staff to your clients requirements
- Building honest relationships within your portfolio
- Weekly reports and catch ups with Account Director
